skill.name: raffle-winner-picker
skill.description: Picks random winners from lists, spreadsheets, or Google Sheets for giveaways, raffles, and contests. Ensures fair, unbiased selection with transparency.
skill.summary: Picks random winners from lists, spreadsheets, or Google Sheets for giveaways, raffles, and contests...
skill.author: ComposioHQ

security_audit.summary: This skill contains only documentation with no executable code, network calls, or file system access. It's a pure prompt-based skill with zero security risks.

content.user_title: Pick Random Winners for Giveaways and Contests
content.value_statement: Running giveaways and need to select winners fairly? This skill randomly picks winners from lists, spreadsheets, or Google Sheets with complete transparency and no bias.
actual_capabilities: Randomly select winners from plain text lists
Pick winners from CSV and Excel files
Prevent duplicate winners across multiple draws
Support weighted selection based on entry counts
limitations: Requires manual input of participant data
No built-in integration with social media platforms
Random selection only, no algorithmic filtering

use_cases.title: Instagram Giveaway Winners
use_cases.description: Pick fair winners from comment-based giveaways and export results for announcement posts

use_cases.title: Conference Raffle Drawings
use_cases.description: Select winners from attendee lists during live events with transparent selection process

use_cases.title: Subscriber Giveaways
use_cases.description: Randomly choose winners from email subscriber lists for book or product giveaways

prompt_templates.title: Basic Winner Selection
prompt_templates.prompt: Pick a random winner from this list: [paste your list here]

prompt_templates.title: Multiple Winners
prompt_templates.prompt: Pick 5 random winners from entries.csv, ensure no duplicates

prompt_templates.title: Google Sheet Raffle
prompt_templates.prompt: Pick a random winner from this Google Sheet: [insert Sheet URL]

prompt_templates.title: Weighted Selection
prompt_templates.prompt: Pick a winner with weighted probability based on the 'ticket_count' column in my Excel file

output_examples.input: Pick a random winner from this list: Alice, Bob, Carol, David, Eve

best_practices: Document the selection timestamp and method for transparency
Pick runner-ups in case the primary winner is ineligible
Verify winner meets all contest requirements before announcing
anti_patterns: Don't manually manipulate results after selection
Avoid selecting winners without documenting the process
Never reuse the same selection for multiple prizes

faq.question: Is the selection truly random?
faq.answer: Yes, it uses cryptographically secure random number generation to ensure fair, unbiased selection

faq.question: Can I exclude previous winners?
faq.answer: Yes, provide a list of names to exclude and the skill will select from remaining entries

faq.question: Does it work with Excel files?
faq.answer: Yes, the skill can read Excel (.xlsx) files, CSV files, and Google Sheets

faq.question: Is my data safe?
faq.answer: The skill only processes your data temporarily for selection and doesn't store or transmit it

faq.question: Can I verify the selection later?
faq.answer: Yes, each selection includes a timestamp and can provide a seed for third-party verification

faq.question: How is this better than manual selection?
faq.answer: It eliminates human bias, provides audit trails, and handles large datasets efficiently
